Cory Cross

Cory Cross

Tools

  • footprint_generator.py - Python script to generate footprints automatically from a list of dimensions. Currently only includes SMT caps, little documentation so far. I will update soon, as I'm using this tool right now. Software architecture consists of all generators in this one file, and the user interface (command-line,text,GUI) is subclassed or otherwise uses it. Users can develop their own generator against mine by subclassing before offering it for submission, without worrying about merging any changes I develop in the mean time.

Documentation

Symbols

Note: all my symbols are licensed GPL for distribution, and unlimited for use.

Footprints

Note: all my footprints are licensed GPL for distribution, and unlimited for use.

See all my footprints in the footprints/ directory.
All my footprints should have a meaningful description, have the 0,0 coordinate in the center of the part, and be used on a board before I post them up here. If the part was automatically generated (usually obvious from the filename), I may not have used that exact one, but one of the series has been used on a board and shown to be correct.
Rather than browse my footprints, it's probably best to search for them (since it searches my nice descriptions too).
